name: Anas Attar
title: Full Stack Developer
hero: I'm a Full Stack Developer specializing in React, Next.js, Node.js, and modern APIs, passionate about crafting scalable, responsive, and user-friendly web applications.
about: I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer from Palestine with a strong focus on frontend development. Since 2020, I’ve been building web applications using modern technologies . I enjoy turning ideas into real, functional, and user-friendly experiences.I’ve worked on diverse projects, including e-commerce platforms, local business directories, and social media-style applications. I believe in clean code, responsive design, and continuously learning new tools to deliver better results.Whether working independently or with a team, I’m always committed to building scalable and impactful web solutions tailored to user needs.

projects.title: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: An advanced e-commerce platform designed for a smooth online shopping experience. Built with React, Redux, Express, Stripe, and MongoDB, it offers users a seamless and secure shopping experience while providing merchants with the tools to manage products, orders, and payments efficiently.

projects.title: POS Website
projects.description: A fully-featured POS app built with React, Redux, Express, Stripe, and MongoDB. This app allows merchants to efficiently manage their products, orders, and payments, providing a seamless and secure online store experience.
